reviewText: I am a big fan of the Dog Whisperer Series and had purchased the previous 3 seasons.  I was disappointed to see that they have spit the 4th season into 2 volumes.  Seems to me the producers are taking advantage of its popularity to gouge the fans. Each season has about the same number of episodes so there is no reason to spit it into two and charge double- except greed.
Title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: Season 4, Vol. 1

reviewText: We gave this collection to our daughter and her animal shelter (Forget-Me-Not-Shelter in Ferry County, WA). They use it to train volunteers. And the shelter needs donations.
Title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: Season 4, Vol. 1

reviewText: Cesar's way as effective as always. Same tips, new dog issues. Cesar increases its own habilities to manage extreme dog mental unbalance. This is a must and we're waiting the second part of this Season.
Title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: Season 4, Vol. 1

reviewText: Always learn something new when viewing Ceasar's DVD's.  I like the way Ceasar explains why dogs do what they do.  He points out behaviors the the majority of pet owners would not notice.  Ceasar seems to improve with each season and tackles more and more unique problems.
Title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: Season 4, Vol. 1

reviewText: I definitely would recommend this Season to anyone. The Dog Whisperer, definitely has a way with dogs, and understands them. I wish I did as well as he does. Anyone who wants to own a dog, or has dogs whether or not they are having trouble or not, should watch his shows to help them.DEFINITELY A MUST HAVE!!!
Title: Dog Whisperer with Cesar Millan: Season 4, Vol. 1
